name: yellow-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures confusion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A flute made from yellow glass that snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A flute made from yellow glass. It snaps Pokémon out of confusion.
